According to the first applicant , DATE prior to DATE , that is , in DATE , she , her son PERSON and their neighbour were in a ORG lorry driving from their village to the village of ORG in the ORG district of GPE . CARDINAL . Since DATE the first applicant has repeatedly applied in person and in writing to various public bodies . She has been supported in her efforts by the SRJI NGO . The applicants submitted some of the letters to the authorities and their replies to the ORG . These documents are summarised below .
